mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (id, project_id, num, task_name, task_cover, task_start_time, task_end_time, creator, create_time, last_modified_user, last_modified_time) VALUES (NULL, #{projectId}, #{num}, #{taskName}, #{taskCover}, #{taskStartTime},#{taskEndTime}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedTime})
INSERT INTO project_task_student (id, project_id, task_id, student_id, status) VALUES (NULL, #{projectId}, #{taskId}, #{studentId}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT project_task_student.id AS pst_id, task.num AS task_num, project_task_student.grade AS task_grade, project_task_student.status AS task_status -- project_task_student.tags AS tags FROM project_task_student INNER JOIN task ON project_task_student.task_id=task.id WHERE ( project_task_student.student_id=#{studentId} AND project_task_student.project_id=#{projectId} )

SELECT project_task_student.id AS pst_id, project_task_student.project_id AS project_id, project_task_student.student_id AS student_id, project_task_student.grade AS task_grade, -- project_task_student.tags AS task_tags, project_task_student.evaluate AS task_evaluate, project_task_student.improvement AS task_improvement, project_task_student.content AS task_content, project_task_student.status AS task_status, project_task_student.resubmit AS task_resubmit, task.num AS task_num, task.task_name AS task_name, task.task_start_time AS task_start_time, task.task_end_time AS task_end_time FROM project_task_student INNER JOIN task ON project_task_student.task_id=task.id WHERE project_task_student.project_id=#{projectId} AND project_task_student.student_id=#{studentId} ORDER BY task_num

SELECT project_task_student.id AS pst_id, project_task_student.project_id AS project_id, project_task_student.student_id AS student_id, project_task_student.grade AS task_grade, -- project_task_student.tags AS task_tags, project_task_student.evaluate AS task_evaluate, project_task_student.improvement AS task_improvement, project_task_student.content AS task_content, project_task_student.status AS task_status, project_task_student.resubmit AS task_resubmit, task.num AS task_num, task.task_name AS task_name FROM project_task_student INNER JOIN task ON project_task_student.task_id=task.id WHERE project_task_student.id = #{pstId}
